sentence: The committee also subpoenaed Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate and state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R), Arizona GOP chairwoman Kelli Ward, former Michigan Republican State Committee chairwoman Laura Cox and Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem (R), who is also a member of the far-right militia group the Oath Keepers.

title: Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Trump Campaign Officials Over Fake Electors Scheme

sentence: The opponent, a QAnon-linked retired military officer and state senator, Doug Mastriano, is leading the nine-person field by about 10 percentage points, according to the RealClearPolitics average of polls in the race.
title: Pence will headline a rally for Kemp in Georgia, splitting with Trump.

sentence: On Jan. 6, both the front-runner in Pennsylvanias Republican gubernatorial primary state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) and one of the leading candidates for the states Republican Senate nomination Kathy Barnette were in Washington.

title: In a GOP primary, support for Jan. 6 isnt an obstacle. Is it an asset?

sentence: In a last-minute endorsement that rattled members of Pennsylvanias Republican party, Trump backed Mastriano, a leading force in trying to overturn the 2020 election results who was pictured outside the Capitol on Jan. 6. There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano,? Trump said last week.

sentence: Last week, Trump-endorsed Doug Mastriano, who supports Trump's claims of election fraud, won the Pennsylvania gubernatorial nomination.

sentence: And his falsehoods about election fraud have paved the way for restrictive new voting laws in states such as Georgia, Florida, Texas and Iowa, and have led to the party nominating candidates such as state Sen.
